message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get the remaining 10%.  It's a good start, right?
I think a 55/45 split is a more fair starting point. Let's work from there.
Let's compromise. I'll take 60% and you get 40%.  It's still a good deal, especially considering the inflation.
I think a 60/40 split is a fairer reflection of the work we've both put in.  What do you say?
